Text:
Thanks so much Plarsugo, the quality is quite nice and definitely watchable! I will seed what I took [at least].  The ONLY up to date and complete series of Peep Show on TPB.  I appreciate you fitting all of the series in a fair sized package.  Cheers!

A: 8/10
V: 8/10
Show: 20/10
Thanks for the effort on this Plarsugo.

A: 10/10
V: 9/10 (As good as it gets in SD)

One of the best comedy shows out there.
This is the funniest British show I've seen so far. I can see why all the other good British comedy shows gets cancelled, if this is the standard.
